name: Candy Apple Espresso Roast - Instinct Roastery - 200 gram
description: 50% Toraja Washed - 20% Colombia Sequoias Watermelon - 30% Flores Natural A little fun we have on the roastery when we stumble on this sample on our cupping table We thought, "What if we make a blend that tastes like candy and apple at the same time?" And just like that, this blend is made out of a combination we've never thought before With our Toraja Pango-Pango Washed as our base, we give a combination with Flores Natural which enhances the sweetness and mouthfeel together with toraja, and the colombia sequoias added that fun with notes that has two layers, apple and also watermelon notes This blend will give you a sense of eating fruit candy A little gift from us to you, Merry Christmas!

name: Ethiopia Tima Washed - Instinct Roastery - 150 gram
description: Region : Guji Process : Washed Variety : 74110 Altitude : 2150 masl This Ethiopia flaunts its light body and this tima we bring Tima with sweeter notes that reminds you of peach Guji has been constantly be the region that produces complex and high quality Ethiopian coffee The condition of its terroir and also high altitude which revolves around 2000-2150 masl creating a slow process of ripe cherry which also resulting in complex and delicate flavor This is for you who looks for light bodied coffee with notes of peach and layer of bergamot with that classic floral notes of Ethiopia

name: Espresso Roast Kenya Tatu - Instinct Roastery - 200 gram
description: Process : Natural Region : Kiambu County Farm : Tatu Estate Variety : SL28 & SL34 Releasing espresso roast has been nothing but a joy for us. Offering you different kind of flavor spectrum for your daily espresso is our goals in through this platform This time we bring you Natural Kenyan coffee from Tatu Estate. Tatu Estate is a part of Kofinaf Company, a historical and big producer of coffee in Kenya. It has its own record of consistently bringing good coffee on your cupping table and furthermore this Natural processed coffee, less known in Kenya where most of them are washed, is bringing something unique yet excellent in its juiciness and sweetness This is a balanced cup of espresso in its fruitiness that reminds you of red fruits like currant and pomegranate yet sweetness that taste caramelish

name: Ethiopia Sidama Baturo - Instinct Roastery - 150 gram
description: Process : Anaerobic Natural Variety : 74158 Region : Sidama Farm : Karamo Washing Station A little subjective personal description on this beans as one of our team usually do not enjoy anaerobic natural beans and on her first sip, it is just an entirely different texture and experience for her This beans has our hearts on its first roast with such delicate texture and orange spectrum that reminds you of tangerine with layers of stonefruit that reminds you of nectarine and closed with that taste of oolong tea This is juicy yet tea-like, perfect for any time of the day

name: Colombia Eliecer Ordóñez - Instinct Roastery - 150 gram
description: Process : Washed Variety : Pink Bourbon Region : Huila Farm : El Placer Owned by Pastor Ordóñez, Finca El Placer has been known for growing Caturra and Pink Bourbon varieties as its highlight. Located in the region of Huila, Colombia, this farm is known for its micro-lots rather than bulk commercial lots El Placer is a part of Associacion Los Naranjos, a community of small producers that has strict and careful procedures in processing its coffee, resulting in consistency of high quality coffee This Colombia has been nothing but a joy ever since we cup it in our cupping table, and we are delighted to present it for you to try. This coffee has balanced quality with red currant in the spotlight on your first sip, layers of pomelo bright acidity and wrapped with sugarcane mellow sweetness

name: Burundi Kayanza Natural - Instinct Roastery - 150 gram
description: Process : Natural Variety : Bourbon Farm : Long Miles Region : Kayanza A connection built from last year to Osito brought us to this new region from Ethiopia to our shelf. We love when connections bring us a lot of excitements and new things to explore together A first time for us to exhibit Burundi Region coffee beans and it doesn't disappoint the littlest bit This Burundi is sourced from Long Miles coffee farm, a renowned coffee farm that develops washing station mainly on Burundi. With transparancy and hard work, Long Miles has been known for its quality in specialty coffee industry This is for you who wants that juiciness of purple fruits with hint of chocolate liquor adding to its sweetness

name: Caramel Floral - Instinct Roastery Espresso Blend - 200 gram
description: Toraja Pango-Pango Washed - Ethiopia Washed The moment we cupped the samples from the Toraja a few months ago, we knew how the quality of the flavor that this Toraja gives is just beautiful We knew how a lot of you also longs for another espresso blend from us so here we are presenting you with such collaboration This Toraja gives you beautiful caramel-ish sweetness that has very round quality and also smooth at the same time, then comes the acidity, citrusy acidity coming from the Ethiopian Washed which creates such harmonious flavor making this a balanced espresso blend with sweetness but also that elegant aromatic quality

name: Toraja Pango-Pango Washed - Instinct Roastery - 200 gram
description: Variety : S-Lini, Bourbon Process : Washed Region : Tana Toraja Farm : Aluk Coffee Altitude : 1600 masl This local beans captured our heart on the cupping table when we sample this. We feel a little excitement of adding another region of Indonesia to our shelf. This classic washed Toraja from Pango-Pango gives its charm with its clean finish, cheery bright citrusy acidity that reminds you of lemon, topped with acidity of stonefruit that gives balance to the lemon ish acidity, and sweetness that wraps it off like honey

name: Ethiopia Sidama Karama Washed - Instinct Roastery - 200 gram
description: Region : Bura Karamo Altitude : 2200 masl Process : Washed Variety : Heirloom A big big smile in our roastery team upon cupping this Ethiopian classic washed process We always know that a lot of you excited when we release any Ethiopian beans, we also always aim for giving you varieties of Ethiopian beans This beautiful classic washed boasts about its refined acidity of mandarin orange, with layers of bergamot and what makes this beans even more excellent is the fact that it has sweetness that reminds you of sugarcane Purchase this if you want to find yourself sipping light refined cup of acidity with touch of balanced sweetness

name: Apparel - Instinct Roastery T-Shirt - Putih, S
description: A collective creation from our brand An exciting beginning of our craft journey as we collaborate with Aye & Co to celebrate a creation between crafts : - A t-shirt that is easy for you to wear daily, equipped with a technique to make you look neat and clean - A hoodie to warm up with comfortable materials that is still comfortable to wear in tropical climate - A denim jacket with sleek cutting and highlights of our logo that's perfect for layering your casual t-shirt or formal shirt PLEASE NOTE! Refer to our size chart before buying, and please do re-check your choice of colors in t-shirt as we have three different colors

name: Bali Berry - Instinct Roastery - 200 gram
description: Seasonal Espresso Blend for you! A creation from one of our Roastery Team, an idea to highlight our components for wholesale beans which hasn't come to spotlight to many This blend is based on our Bali Karana, a CM Natural beans that has been on our line-up for years Partnered up with Bali, we go with the favorite Blueberry Apple, the Aceh Blend, and topping it off with Brazil This blend is for you who loves a balanced coffee, with notes of chocolate and fruitiness

name: Brewing Tools - Instinct Roastery - Instinct Server
description: Brewing tools for catering your brewing experience Each product has its own box that suit its measurement and wrapped with bubble wrap inside Please note that we apply insurance for these products and we pack it with extra bubble wrap on the outer surface as well INSTINCT SERVER Our server comes in 500ml with a nice touch of Instinct logo on one side This server is made out of borosilicate glass that is heatproof Our tools come with a box that is made perfectly for its measurement Safe for dishwasher TUMBLER GLASS Our glass comes in 250ml with a nice touch of Instinct logo on one side This glass is made out of borosilicate glass that is heatproof Our tools come with a box that is made perfectly for its measurement Safe for dishwasher ORIGAMI DRIPPER CERAMIC S Our version of Origami Dripper comes with our logo on its body This beautifully made dripper comes in two colors, matte grey and white We suggest you to buy it in bundles with the holder as it is a soulmate in heaven Safe for dishwasher ORIGAMI DRIPPER HOLDER Our holder comes in two choices as well We recommend you to pair the white one with white one, and the grey one with white splash black one This holder is NOT SAFE for dishwasher, please wash it by hand ORIGAMI ASYMMETRIC CUP BLACK This cup offers you two sides of coffee One side offers clarity with more acidity and lighter mouthfeel, the other side offers you with bolder mouthfeel and more sweetness Safe for dishwasher ORIGAMI PAPER FILTER WAVE FOR 4CUPS This paper filter is made for bigger size of Origami Dripper up to 4 cups A box contains 50 pcs of paper filter ORIGAMI PAPER FILTER WAVE FOR 2CUPS This paper filter is made for bigger size of Origami Dripper up to 2 cups A box contains 50 pcs of paper filter

name: P Blend - Instinct Roastery - Biji Kopi - 200 gram
description: *PLEASE NOTE BEFORE BUYING!* Untuk permintaan digiling menjadi bubuk kopi, mohon cantumkan di bagian notes karena jika tidak kami akan mengirimkan dalam bentuk biji kopi utuh Terima kasih P for Premium Blend ( Darker Roast Instinct Version ) A blend made for people who love big-bodied coffee with low acidity, yet still has the strong character and flavor of specialty coffee Using 100% Arabica specialty grade coffee Suitable for milk, or classic espresso taste / kopi susu.

name: Guatemala Espresso - Instinct Coffee - Biji kopi - 200 gram
description: *PLEASE NOTE BEFORE BUYING!* Untuk permintaan digiling menjadi bubuk kopi, mohon cantumkan di bagian notes karena jika tidak kami akan mengirimkan dalam bentuk biji kopi utuh Terima kasih Varian lain utk kopi espresso dengan karakter low acidity, creamy dan sweet kali ini datang dari Guatemala. Guatemala merupakan favorite daerah kami selain brazil. Dimana Brazil menghasilkan mouthfeel yang lebih berat, full dengan notes chocolate nutty sedangkan guatemala menghasilkan rasa yang lebih bersih, more rounded sweetness dikomplimen dengan rasa nutty dan juga sweetness seperti toffee. Varian espresso lain utk kamu yg suka karakter low acidity. Kopi pertama kali tiba di Guatemala pada abad ke-18 di Antigua. Perkebunan mulai tersebar selama 150 tahun berikutnya, sebagian besar dimiliki oleh penjajah Eropa. Negara ini memperoleh kemerdekaan pada tahun 1821, dan produksi kopi melonjak, menjadikan Guatemala sebagai produsen kopi yang penting. Kopi ini berasal Dekat kota Jilotepeque di wilayah Chimaltenango, terdapat pertanian luas Finca El Retiro del Quisaya. Peternakan ini didirikan 100 tahun yang lalu oleh keluarga Ortega dan baru-baru ini dijual ke organisasi Arabigos del Sur. Nama peternakan ini berasal dari sungai yang mengalir di dalam tanah tersebut. Perkebunan : El Retiro Quisaya Varietas : Bourbon Proses: Dicuci sepenuhnya Ketinggian : 1.800 meter di atas permukaan laut Kota / Kota : San Martin Jilotepeque Wilayah : Chimaltenango Pemilik : Arabigos del Sur, S.A.

name: Bali Karana CM Natural - Instinct Coffee - Biji Kopi - 200 gram
description: *PLEASE NOTE BEFORE BUYING!* Untuk permintaan digiling menjadi bubuk kopi, mohon cantumkan di bagian notes karena jika tidak kami akan mengirimkan dalam bentuk biji kopi utuh Terima kasih Origin : Bali - Kintamani Producer : Karana Process : CM Natural Varietas : S795 & Kartika Altitude : 1200 - 1500 masl This is our third year working with Bli Edi from Karana Global. They produce one of the best natural coffees in Indonesia and we hope this years harvest also meets your expectations Karana is a collaboration between two coffee professionals who share a common passion for exceptional coffee. Rodney Glick, Australian, and I Kadek Edi, Indonesian, are both Certified Licensed Q Graders, Processors, Roasters, and experts in the coffee supply chain. Karana farm, process, and trade Indonesian Specialty and Commercial Coffee based in Ubud, Bali with a Coffee Bureau in Medan, Sumatra. Embedded in Balinese traditional village life with a focus on the global coffee market Karana are focused on quality from farm to cup. In 2021, at the first Indonesian held Cup of Excellence, Karana achieved the highest scoring Bali coffee as well as being ranked in the top 20 coffees overall.

name: Espresso Caramel Nutty - Biji Kopi Espresso - 500gr
description: *PLEASE NOTE BEFORE BUYING!* Untuk permintaan digiling menjadi bubuk kopi, mohon cantumkan di bagian notes karena jika tidak kami akan mengirimkan dalam bentuk biji kopi utuh Terima kasih All time favorite espresso This is for you who looks for a low acidity with high body and sweetness in your cup Suitable for your daily needs of espresso-based drinks

Cocok untuk kamu yang ingin mengirim kopi sebagai hadiah kecil penuh makna untuk orang tersayang di hari Natal. name: Biji Kopi Arabica COLOMBIA PAPAYO INMACULADA NATURAL Specialty Arabica Coffee Beans - 15gr, BIJI
description: Origin: Valle Del Cauca, Colombia Variety: PapayoAteng Altitude: 1800-2000 masl Processing: Anaerobic Natural Farmer: Inmaculada Fellow Farms Tasting Notes: Plum, Orange & Pineapple The Papayo variety is rare outside of Huila and little is known about how it arrived in Colombia. It was originally thought to be a Caturra mutation, but genetic testing by World Coffee Research indicates a close relationship with Ethiopian Landraces. Papayo cherries are distinctive, with an elongated shape. It is assumed that the local name comes from the papaya fruit. !! We'll also give you the brewing recommendation to brew the coffee with Hario V60 !! LIMITED STOCK --- PENTING! HANYA BISA DALAM BENTUK BIJI agar menjaga beans sampai dalam keadaan aman dan intensitas rasanya tidak cepat menurun. Semua pesanan yang masuk lewat dari jam 3 sore AKAN DIKIRIM KEESOKAN HARINYA.

name: Kopi Arabika BOGOR LACTIC WASHED (100 gr) Single Origin Specialty Coffee - BIJI
description: HALAL ID32110016691860324 Origin: Bogor, West Java Variety: S-795, Sigarar Utang, and Ateng Super (Gayo-3)5, Ateng Altitude: 1100-1300 masl Processing: Lactic Washed Farmer: Java Kirana Tasting Notes: Orange, Almond & Brown Sugar These coffees are mixed varieties of S-795, Sigarar Utang, and Ateng Super (Gayo-3), which are grown between 1100–1300 masl. Fresh cherries are picked and sorted. Coffee is pulped then undergoes 48 hours of fermentation in the controlled saline condition. Afterward, the pulped cherry is washed until the mucilage is deattached from the parchment. After being washed with fresh water, the clean coffee parchment is dried for 12 days inside a moisture-regulated UV greenhouse. After it's dried, the coffee undergoes a resting process inside the parchment for 1 month before being hulled and ready to sell. Biji kopi dapat langsung di giling langsung sesuai permintaan: - Giling Espresso - Giling Kasar - Giling Medium - Giling Halus - GIling V60 (disesuaikan dengan resep yang anda dapat) PENTING! It’s made from Sigararutang and Lini S varieties, and processed using the honey method by local producers at Bukik Gompong Coffee. name: Biji Kopi Arabika Mantesa Bengkulu Natural (1 KG) Single Origin Specialty Coffee Beans - Whole Beans
description: New Coffee from Bengkulu! Produced by Mantesa Kopi Family in Sumber Urip village, Curup, Bengkulu this coffee carefully crafted and grown at 1300 mdpl, with blend of Ateng & Sigararutang varieties. The coffee cherries are injected with ozone gas to eliminate microbes and create a hygienic environment for fermentation. They are then fermented under anaerobic conditions for 84 hours before being dried on raised beds under direct sunlight. Origin: Sumber Urip, Curug, Bengkulu Process: Ozonic Anaerobic Natural Variety: Ateng & Sigararutang Altitude: 1300 MASL Roasted: Filter Roast Tasting notes: Pear, White Grape & Brown Sugar Biji kopi dapat langsung di giling langsung sesuai permintaan: - Giling Espresso - Giling Kasar - Giling Medium - Giling Halus - GIling V60 (disesuaikan dengan resep yang anda dapat) KAMI AKAN BERIKAN 8gr FREE SAMPLE BEANS! #GreatCoffeeForGreatPeople Penting! name: CUP TASTERS KIT, PRACTICE LIKE A CHAMPION! Volume 6 - 60gr, Biji
description: CUP TASTER KIT, PRACTICE LIKE A CHAMPION VOL. 6! Kit ini bisa digunakan untuk Great People yang sedang latihan untuk berkompetisi Cup Tasters atau bisa juga untuk Great People yang ingin melatih Sensory Skill dengan mencoba soal-soal Triangulasi ini. Let's practice like a champion!

name: Biji Kopi Arabica FINCA DON OBAR SIGARARUTANG HSH (500gr) Specialty Arabica Coffee Beans - BIJI
description: Finca Don Obar, a coffee farm nestled on the slopes of Mount Papandayan within the Nangklak block, stands at an impressive altitude of 1,630 meters above sea level. Under the leadership of Eka Teguh Kurniawan, the farm is dedicated to excellence during the harvest season. Each coffee cherry is handpicked with utmost care to ensure the tree remains unscathed, and only the ripest yellowish-red cherries are selected. This Sigararutang coffee is processed using a Hermetically Sealed Honey method. Expect vibrant tasting notes of Plum, Orange & Figs. Celebrated for its bright, fruity acidity, smooth body, and complex flavor profile, this coffee stands out as a true gem among Indonesian coffees. Origin: Mt. Papandayan, Garut, West Java, Indonesia Altitude: 1600 masl Variety: Sigararutang Processing: Hermetically Sealed Honey Producer: Finca Don Obar Tasting Notes: Plum, Orange & Figs Biji kopi dapat langsung di giling langsung sesuai permintaan: - Giling Espresso - Giling Kasar - Giling Medium - Giling Halus - GIling V60 (disesuaikan dengan resep yang anda dapat) PENTING! name: Biji Kopi Arabica Sumatra Pollung Espresso Coffee Beans 200 gram - Biji
description: An espresso with distinctive character from the highlands of Pollung, North Sumatra. Processed using the traditional wet hulled method unique to Sumatra, this coffee delivers a full-bodied and complex flavor profile. Expect bright orange notes, warm spices, and a natural sweetness reminiscent of brown sugar.The wet hulled process creates a perfect balance of low acidity and earthy undertones, complemented by subtle herbal aromas. Sumatra Pollung Espresso is ideal for those seeking a bold coffee experience with rich, layered flavors and strong character. Origin: Pollung, North Sumatra, Indonesia Process: Wet Hulled Variety: Typica, Lini S & Ateng Super Altitude: 1200-1500 Masl Flavour Notes: Orange, Spice & Brown Sugar Profile Roast for Espresso

Akan lebih menyenangkan jika Great People bisa lebih banyak mengeksplorasi berbagai rasa yang ada pada beans Espresso yang berbeda-beda. Setelah kami merilis paket Espresso Full Arabika, hari ini kami merilis paket paket Espresso Arabika Robusta. Di dalam paket Espresso ini terdapat 4 beans Espresso yang memiliki karakter rasa yang berbeda-beda. Paket ini cocok untuk Great People yang ingin mengeksplorasi berbagai rasa pada Espresso. Dalam 1 paket ini Great People bisa mencoba 4 varian Espresso yang kami punya dari mulai : - Robusta The Beard (200gr) - Arabusta Greek Freak 70 Robusta x 30 Arabika (200gr) - Es Kopi Susu Blend (200gr) - Arabusta The Joker. (200gr) Semua varian Espresso ini bisa Great People coba dirumah untuk dibuat Latte, Black, Cappuccino. Atau bisa juga sebagai opsi beans Espresso untuk coffee shop yang Great People miliki. TIDAK ADA FREE SAMPLE UNTUK PEMBELIAN ESPRESSO BEANS, TERIMA KASIH. #Greatcoffeeforgreatpeople Penting! Foto produk / desain produk dapat berubah tanpa ada pemberitahuan, menyesuaikan stok kemasan kopi yang ada. Terimakasih!

name: CUP TASTERS KIT, PRACTICE LIKE A CHAMPION! Volume 4 - 60gr, Biji
description: CUP TASTER KIT, PRACTICE LIKE A CHAMPION VOL.4 Setelah kami merilis Cup Tasters Kit volume 1,2 dan 3, kali ini kami merilis Cup Tasters Kit Vol4, yang dimana kami bisa bilang di soal tringulasi kali ini tingkat kesulitan soalnya lebih sulit daripada sebelumnya dan tentunya akan lebih memacu tingkat kefokusan dan skill Great People ketika berlatih Cup Tasters. Didalamnya terdapat 4 pax soal beans yang merupakan salah satu set latihan yang digunakan Mandie Soengkono ketika persiapan kompetisi Nasional ataupun World Stage Kompetisi Cup Tasters. Tidak hanya beans, di dalam kit ini terdapat panduan-panduan untuk membuat soal latihan Cup Tasters seperti Triangulation Pattern, Brewing Guide with Batch Brew & Clever Dripper 03. Kit ini bisa digunakan untuk Great People yang sedang latihan untuk berkompetisi Cup Tasters atau bisa juga untuk Great People yang ingin melatih Sensory Skill dengan mencoba soal-soal Triangulasi ini. #fugolcoffeeroasters #greatcoffeeforgreatpeople Tersedia dalam 2 ukuran: 60gr x 4pcs dan 120gr x 4pcs #GreatCoffeeforGreatPeople

name: CUP TASTERS KIT, PRACTICE LIKE A CHAMPION! Volume 3 - 60gr, Biji
description: CUP TASTER KIT, PRACTICE LIKE A CHAMPION VOL.3 Setelah kami merilis Cup Tasters Kit volume 1 & 2, kali ini kami merilis Cup Tasters Kit Vol.3 yang dimana kami bisa bilang di soal tringulasi kali ini tingkat kesulitan soalnya lebih sulit daripada sebelumnya dan tentunya akan lebih memacu tingkat kefokusan dan skill Great People ketika berlatih Cup Tasters. Didalamnya terdapat 4 pax soal beans yang merupakan salah satu set latihan yang digunakan Mandie Soengkono ketika persiapan kompetisi Nasional ataupun World Stage Kompetisi Cup Tasters. Tidak hanya beans, di dalam kit ini terdapat panduan-panduan untuk membuat soal latihan Cup Tasters seperti Triangulation Pattern, Brewing Guide with Batch Brew & Clever Dripper 03. Kit ini bisa digunakan untuk Great People yang sedang latihan untuk berkompetisi Cup Tasters atau bisa juga untuk Great People yang ingin melatih Sensory Skill dengan mencoba soal-soal Triangulasi ini.. Tersedia dalam 2 ukuran: 60gr x 4pcs dan 120gr x 4pcs #GreatCoffeeforGreatPeople

name: Biji Kopi Arabika COLOMBIA DECAF (1 KG) Single Origin Coffee - BIJI
description: P-IRT 3083273910347-28 Introducing ou rnew coffeebeans : COLOMBIA DECAF ! Coffee is one of the worlds most popular beverages. Everyone loves drinking coffee,but some people want to limit their caffeine in take for personal preferences or health reasons. For these people,there is an excellent alternative : DECAF COFFEE ! Decaf is short for decaffeinated coffee. Its coffee from coffee beans that have had at least 97% of their caffeine removed. There are many way store move caffeine from coffee beans. Most of them include water, organic solvents or carbondioxide. Decaf coffee is just like regular coffee, but the caffeine has been removed and the taste and smell may become a little milder and the coffee has low acidity with notes of hint of berries & dark chocolate. Origin: Huila,Colombia Altitude: 1200-1800masl Varietas: Typica & Caturra Method: Washed, Ethyl Acetatedecaffeinated FlavorNotes: Hint of Berries & Dark Chocolate (LOWACIDITY) Profile roast: Medium to Dark Biji kopi dapat langsung digiling langsung sesuai permintaan: -Giling Espresso -Giling Kasar -Giling Medium -Giling Halus -GIling V60( disesuaikan dengan resep yang anda dapat) PENTING! name: Biji Kopi Arabika JOHN'S BLEND 200 gr Specialty Arabica Coffee Beans - BIJI
description: HALAL ID32110016691860324 NEW SPECIAL RELEASE BY 5TH WORLD BREWERS CUP CHAMPIONSHIP JOHN RICARD CHRISTHOPER WELCOME "JOHN'S BLEND" 50% Kamojang Natural x 50% Kamojang Washed Jika kita kilas balik di tahun 2022, saat John Christopher mewakilkan Indonesia di WBRC 2022, John menggunakan blend kopi dari satu kebun kopi yang sama tapi dengan Lot yang berbeda yaitu Finca Nuguo Anerobic Natural Lot 202 dan Lot 212. Mengapa John memilih blend? Karena dengan menggabungkan kedua kopi yang memiliki karakter berbeda, kita bisa mendapatkan flavour notes baru yang sebelumnya tidak kita temukan di setiap kopinya. Dan hal ini dapat memberikan hasil seduhan yang balance dari suhu panas, hangat hingga dingin. Nah, sekarang John ingin merekomendasikan Johns Blend untuk Great People yang komposisi didalamnya yaitu beans lokal dari 1 kebun yang sama namun 2 proses yang berbeda, 50% Kamojang Natural dan 50% Kamojang Washed. Kedua beans Kamojang ini tentunya memiliki karakter yang berbeda, beans Natural yang memiliki karakter intensitas flavour yang tinggi dan body tebal sedangkan beans Washed yang memiliki karakter kopi yang lebih light. Setelah digabungkan, blend ini menghasilkan tasting notes Watermelon, Berries & Red Apple. Roasted: Light-Medium Biji kopi dapat langsung di giling sesuai permintaan: - Giling Espresso - Giling Halus - Giling Sedang - Giling Kasar PENTING! Semua Pesanan yang masuk lewat dari jam 3 sore AKAN DIKIRIM KEESOKAN harinya. KAMI AKAN BERIKAN 8gr FREE SAMPLE BEANS! SEBAGAI BENTUK PENYESUAIAN KARENA HARGA BAHAN BAKU SEMAKIN MENINGKAT, FREE SAMPLE UNTUK CUPPING AKAN KAMI BERIKAN SEBANYAK 8gr. name: KOPI TUBRUK SACHET Fugol Coffee Roasters - Specialty Coffee Beans
description: NEW DROP: KOPI TUBRUK SACHET Isi 1 paket 3 pcs Keterangan: Kopi ini sudah dalam bentuk giling/bubuk. Tidak bisa dalam bentuk biji Simple, easy to brew and delicious! Kopi Tubruk bisa dibilang merupakan salah satu cara termudah untuk menyeduh kopi dan juga merupakan cara seduh kopi khas Indonesia. Cara membuat kopi tubruk ini cukup mudah, yaitu dengan langsung menuangkan air panas kedalam gelas yang sudah terdapat bubuk kopi didalamnya. Untuk menikmati kopi tubruk ini juga beragam, ada yang senang menambahkan gula atau tanpa gula. Kini Fugol menghadirkan Kopi Tubruk untuk ngopi lebih mudah dan simpel! Great People pilih Single origin mana yang ingin Great People coba dari mulai Aceh Gayo, Bali hingga kopi-kopi Interlokal yang ada di etalase kami. Jangan lupa cantumkan beans pilihan Great People di kolom keterangan saat check out ya kak :D Cara membuat kopi tubruk ini sangat mudah! :D - Tuang bubuk kopi kedalam gelas - Tuang air dengan suhu 94c sebanyak 150ml - Aduk menggunakan sendok - Tunggu selama 4 menit - Kopi Tubruk siap dinikmati! #GreatCoffeeforGreatPeople

name: PBJ T-shirt - Merchandise Collection - M
description: “PBJ” Merch Collection (Jacoweek 2025 Special Release)Roast A Works mempersembahkan “PBJ” Merch Collection, sebuah kaos edisi khusus yang dirilis secara eksklusif dalam rangka Jacoweek 2025. Koleksi ini menghadirkan desain ilustratif yang menampilkan karakter anak dan dua anjing yang berada di atas roti Peanut Butter & Jelly (PBJ), memberikan kesan artistik, modern, dan penuh identitas visual khas brand. Kaos ini diproduksi menggunakan bahan katun premium yang lembut, nyaman, dan memiliki ketahanan tinggi. Teknik sablon berkualitas memastikan detail ilustrasi tetap tajam serta tahan terhadap proses pencucian berulang. Dengan p Potongan unisex, kaos ini sesuai digunakan oleh berbagai kalangan dan cocok untuk kebutuhan kasual sehari-hari. name: SD1R with Ruler Dripper Suprima Instruments - A Roastworks - Alba
description: We've just added to our lineup of tools and equipment on Tokopedia and now collaborating with Suprima Instruments to bring you the SD1R Dripper by @hirolesmana Why You Need the SD1R Dripper This isn't just another dripper; it's a game-changer for your brewing experience. Designed by Indonesian Brewers Cup Champion Hiro Lesmana, the SD1R offers: Its unique semi-immersion design helps you achieve a more consistent and even extraction, reducing the chances of channeling and ensuring every cup is delicious. The precise flow control allows the inherent flavors of your coffee to shine through, bringing out nuanced notes you might miss with other methods. Whether you're a seasoned barista or a passionate home brewer, the SD1R gives you greater control over your brew, letting you experiment with different grind sizes and pour techniques to perfect your cup. The "Ruler" is designed to help precisely fold standard 01-size cone filters into the specific 48-degree shape needed for the dripper. It can also double as a holder for the filter server. Get Yours Today! It's available now on our Tokopedia store in 5 stunning colors: * Nero (Black) * Amber * Clear * Peach * Alba (White) Don't miss out on this tool for a consistently and perfectly extracted cup of coffee! ______ Jam Pemesanan : Gosend / Grab Sameday : max 13.00 Gosend / Grab : max 14.00 Jasa pengiriman Reguler (SiCepat, AnterAja, JNT dan JNE) : max 16.00 𝗨𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗸 𝗣𝗲𝘀𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗻 𝘆𝗮𝗻𝗴 𝗺𝗮𝘀𝘂𝗸 𝗱𝗶𝗹𝘂𝗮𝗿 𝗷𝗮𝗺 𝗽𝗲𝗺𝗲𝘀𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗻 𝗮𝗸𝗮𝗻 𝗱𝗶𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗲𝘀 𝗸𝗲𝗲𝘀𝗼𝗸𝗮𝗻 𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗶 𝗻𝘆𝗮

name: Tapanuli Sibadak Washed Dark Room Dried - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: TAPANULI SIBADAK WASHED DARK ROOM DRIED (NOTES) YELLOW STONE FRUITS, WHITE FLOWERS, TAMARIND, LEMON PRODUCER: Alex Hutabarat - Sibadak Coffee REGION: Sitampurung, Tapanuli VARIETAL: Ateng, P-88, Sigararutang PROCESS: Washed Dark Room Dried ELEVATION: 1250-1300 MASL HARVEST: September, 2025 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE PADI: IDR 350,000/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Located at 1,250–1,300 MASL in Sitampurung Village, North Tapanuli, Sibadak Coffee was established in 2017 by Alex Hutabarat. Alex applies organic-leaning farming methods, enriching soil with compost and minimizing pesticide use. Originally focused on P88 and Ateng Super, he introduced Sidra seeds in 2021, sourced from Ecuador. After seeing the variety’s remarkable potential, Alex expanded Sidra plantings and is now preparing to plant 30,000 new seedlings at higher elevations. This Washed DRD coffee begins with careful pulping and 24-hour wet fermentation, followed by a two-stage drying approach: five days of shade-drying, then 25 days in Alex’s newly built Dark Room Drying facility, where temperature and humidity are controlled. The result is a polished, and refined cup that reveals new dimensions in Tapanuli’s local hybrid varieties.

name: Ecuador La Papaya Geisha Washed - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: ECUADOR LA PAPAYA GEISHA WASHED (NOTES) WHITE PEACH, APRICOT, WHITE FLOWERS PRODUCER: Juan Pena REGION: Saraguro VARIETAL: Geisha PROCESS: Washed ELEVATION: 1800-2100 MASL HARVEST: November, 2024 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE FOB: $ 80/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Founded by Juan Peña in 2010, Hacienda La Papaya stands as a pioneer of specialty coffee cultivation in Ecuador’s Saraguro region. Spanning 11 hectares at 1,800–2,200 MASL, the farm combines agronomic precision with innovative cultivation under a full drip irrigation system. Juan’s vision has always been clear — to produce exceptional coffees through scientific precision and care. This Washed Geisha lot embodies that philosophy. Planted in 2018 from Boquete, Panama seed stock, it thrives in the farm’s high Andean climate. After selective harvesting, the cherries are gently washed and slowly dried in temperature-controlled rooms for 20–30 days. The result is a clean, refined cup — elegant, structured, and delicately floral, reflecting the precision and craftsmanship that define Hacienda La Papaya.

name: Ecuador La Papaya Reserve Typica Mejorado Anaerobic Natural - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: ECUADOR LA PAPAYA TYPICA MEJORADO ANEROBIC NATURAL (RESERVE NANO LOT) (NOTES) STRAWBERRY, PINEAPPLE, HIBISCUS, PLUM PRODUCER: Juan Pena REGION: Saraguro VARIETAL: Typica Mejorado PROCESS: Anaerobic Natural ELEVATION: 1800-2100 MASL HARVEST: November, 2024 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE FOB: $ 80/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Founded by Juan Peña in 2010, Hacienda La Papaya stands as a pioneer of specialty coffee cultivation in Ecuador’s Saraguro region. Spanning 11 hectares at 1,800–2,200 MASL, the farm combines agronomic precision with innovative cultivation under a full drip irrigation system. The region’s sharp contrast of hot days and cool nights enhances sugar development in the cherries, forming the ideal base for the exceptional Typica Mejorado variety — a unique cross between Bourbon and an Ethiopian Landrace. Typica Mejorado is unrelated to the Typica variety. It most likely got this name because its sensory profile is very similar to Typica, but with more complex and expressive flavor notes. The Pichincha breeding lab's researchers imported various coffee seeds, primarily from Ethiopia, to create these new F1 hybrid varieties, according to what many coffee experts believe. This Reserve Lot represents the highest selection of ripest cherries from the harvest, delivering exceptional flavor clarity and vibrancy. For this Anaerobic Reserve Lot, cherries undergo 120 hours of sealed-tank fermentation, then dry slowly in climate-controlled rooms for up to 30 days. The result is a refined, expressive cup with remarkable depth and clarity — a true reflection of Hacienda La Papaya’s terroir and craftsmanship.

name: Guatemala Las Macadamias Geisha Natural (2025 COE Guatemala #1) - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: GUATEMALA LAS MACADAMIAS GEISHA NATURAL (2025 COE GUATEMALA #1 - EXOTIC NATURAL & HONEY CATEGORY) (NOTES) PASSION FRUIT, BERGAMOT WHITE PEACH, WHITE FLOWERSS PRODUCER: Arturo Manuel Aguirre Sáenz REGION: La Libertad, Huehuetenango VARIETAL: Geisha 2871 PROCESS: Natural ELEVATION: 1,580 – 1,830 MASL AWARD: COE Guatemala #1 - Exotic Natural & Honey Category HARVEST: February, 2025 PRICE AUCTION: $ 102.74/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Finca Las Macadamias lies between 1,580 and 1,830 MASL in La Libertad, Huehuetenango, managed by the Aguirre Sáenz family—the third and fourth generations behind El Injerto. The family’s precision and consistency have made El Injerto one of the most awarded farms in Cup of Excellence history, with eight first-place wins to date. Carrying that legacy forward, Las Macadamias serves as the Aguirre family’s field for experimentation — where agronomy, processing, and science converge to shape the future of Guatemalan coffee. Here, new varieties, fermentation techniques, and drying systems are refined to express Huehuetenango’s unique highland terroir with even greater clarity and complexity. This Geisha 2871 Natural represents the culmination of that vision, earning first place in the 2025 Cup of Excellence Natural Category with a score of 91.04 points. The result is a coffee that beautifully captures the purity of Guatemala’s highlands and the Aguirre family’s unwavering pursuit of excellence.

name: Panama Los Lajones Bambu Lot 20B Geisha Natural - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: PANAMA LOS LAJONES BAMBU LOT 20B GEISHA NATURAL (NOTES) MANGO, YELLOW PEACH, JASMINE, HONEY NECTAR PRODUCER: Graciano Cruz REGION: Volcan Baru VARIETAL: Geisha PROCESS: Natural ELEVATION: 1,970 - 2,000 MASL RELATIONSHIP: 1 YEAR PRICE FOB: $ 300/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Los Lajones Estate sits on the southwestern slope of the Barú Volcano Reserve, surrounded by over 100 hectares of pristine cloud forest. Owned and managed by Graciano Cruz, the farm stands among Panama’s most progressive estates. A trained agronomist and microbiologist, Graciano pioneered waterless honey and natural processing, championing ecological, low-impact coffee production long before it became industry standard. His innovative approach continues to earn global recognition — including a 6th-place finish at the Best of Panama 2025. The Bambú lot, planted between 1,970 and 2,000 MASL, is shaded by native oak trees and nurtured in volcanic rich soil. Coffee is hand-harvested twice daily, ensuring only the ripest cherries are selected. After picking, the cherries are rested for 12 hours in small 30 kg bags before being transferred to raised African beds, where they dry slowly for 25–30 days under the mountain sun. The result is a Natural Geisha of exceptional vibrancy and clarity — showcasing floral aromatics, tropical sweetness that reflects both the Bambú micro-lot’s high-elevation terroir and Graciano Cruz’s pioneering craftsmanship.

name: Thailand Saenchai Jupo Bourbon Natural (2025 COE Thailand #3) - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: THAILAND SAENCHAI JUPO BOURBON NATURAL (2025 COE THAILAND #3) (NOTES) STRAWBERRY, CONCORD GRAPE, TROPICAL FRUITS PRODUCER: Saenchai Jupo REGION: Chiang Mai VARIETAL: Bourbon PROCESS: Natural ELEVATION: 1,200-1,450 MASL AWARD: COE Thailand #3 HARVEST: February, 2025 PRICE AUCTION: $ 102.74/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Producer Saenchai Jupo, a young and innovative Akha indigenous farmer, is carrying his family’s 20-year coffee legacy forward at Saenchai Estate in Chiang Mai. Known for his curiosity and dedication, Saenchai continually experiments with processing techniques while sharing his expertise to uplift the quality of coffee in his community. This Bourbon lot, cultivated at 1,200–1,450 MASL, represents his highest Cup of Excellence achievement to date — securing 3rd place with a score of 89.90. After fermentation, the cherries undergo his signature Natural process: one week in a custom-built dryer dome followed by two weeks in a temperature-controlled room. The result is a clean, complex coffee with layers of strawberry, concord grape, and tropical fruits — a reflection of both the distinctive terroir of Chiang Mai and the forward-thinking approach of one of Thailand’s most promising young producers.

name: Nicaragua La Esperanza Geisha Washed (2025 COE Nicaragua #1) - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: NICARAGUA LA ESPERANZA GEISHA WASHED (2025 COE NICARAGUA #1) (NOTES) WHITE FLOWER, NECTARINE, JASMINE, HONEY PRODUCER: Abner Samuel Zavala REGION: Nueva Segovia VARIETAL: Geisha PROCESS: Washed ELEVATION: 1,350 MASL AWARD: COE Nicaragua #1 HARVEST: February, 2025 PRICE AUCTION: $ 145.5/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Abner Samuel Zavala is a third-generation coffee producer who oversees three family estates in the highlands of Nueva Segovia. Continuing the legacy of his late father — who earned 1st place at the Cup of Excellence two decades ago — Samuel has forged his own path, consistently placing in the competition’s top ranks year after year. In 2021, Samuel began planting exotic varieties like Geisha, Sidra, and Chiroso alongside the traditional Maracaturra. This bold step was a reflection of his vision: to push the boundaries of Nicaraguan coffee and showcase its potential on the world stage. Just a few years later, that vision bore fruit — quite literally — when this Geisha’s very first harvest achieved COE recognition, a powerful validation of Samuel’s dedication. This Washed Geisha embodies the finest expression of its terroir, it offers a cup of stunning clarity with delicate notes of white flower, nectarine, jasmine, and honey. A coffee that honors legacy, embraces innovation, and celebrates the beauty of origin.

name: Honduras El Rubi Paraneima Washed (2025 COE Honduras #1) - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: HONDURAS EL RUBI PARANEIMA WASHED (2025 COE HONDURAS #1 - PARANEIMA CATEGORY) (NOTES) FIG, PASSION FRUIT, WHITE FLOWER, YELLOW STONE FRUITS PRODUCER: Jeniffer Iveth Madrid Chávez REGION: El Coquillal, Santa Bárbara VARIETAL: Paraneima PROCESS: Washed ELEVATION: 1,400 MASL AWARD: COE Honduras #1 - Paraneima Category HARVEST: February, 2025 PRICE AUCTION: $ 99.65/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Continuing her family’s legacy, Jeniffer Iveth Madrid Chávez carries Finca El Rubí forward. A fourth-generation producer, she took over her grandfather’s farm in 2019 while still a university student. Today, she manages the 3.5-hectare family farm with the same care and vision passed down through generations. For Jeniffer, coffee is a reflection of family, heritage, and community. Her family has earned multiple top finishes at the Cup of Excellence, including 1st, 4th, and 6th place, with Jeniffer herself placing 7th in 2021. In 2025, she reached a new milestone, taking first place in the Parainema category with a score of 89.65, a testament to years of dedication and care. This Parainema — a rust-resistant hybrid developed by IHCAFE — is a brilliant example of how thoughtful farming and precise processing can elevate a variety’s potential. The cup opens with fig and passion fruit, followed by the soft, nuanced sweetness of yellow stone fruits and delicate floral top notes.

name: Ecuador Hacienda La Papaya Reserve Lot Typica Mejorado Washed - Filter - 100g, Probat P01
description: ECUADOR HACIENDA LA PAPAYA TYPICA MEJORADO WASHED (RESERVE NANO LOT) (NOTES) YELLOW STONE FRUITS, WHITE FLORAL, LILY, LIME PRODUCER: Juan Pena REGION: Saraguro VARIETAL: Typica Mejorado PROCESS: Washed ELEVATION: 1800-2100 MASL HARVEST: November, 2024 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE FOB: $ 75/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Juan Peña is a notable coffee producer in Ecuador, known for its agricultural innovation, and commitment to quality. In 2009, he started growing coffee outside Saraguro, near the small community of La Papaya in Loja. He currently manages 16 hectares of production out of a total of 25 hectares, all of which range in elevation between 1,800 and 2,100 masl. The farm cultivated unique cultivars such as Geisha, Sidra, and Typica Mejorado; F1 hybrid varieties which produced both high yields and good cup quality. Typica Mejorado is unrelated to the Typica variety. It most likely got this name because its sensory profile is very similar to Typica, but with more complex and expressive flavor notes. The Pichincha breeding lab's researchers imported various coffee seeds, primarily from Ethiopia, to create these new F1 hybrid varieties, according to what many coffee experts believe. Cherries for this Reserve Lot are handpicked by only two experts. Cherries are then sorted to remove any immature or damaged ones before being pulped and fermented for 18 to 24 hours. The coffee is then dried in one of five separate drying rooms, each of which is assigned to a different method.

name: Tapanuli Sibadak Sidra Anaerobic Natural Dark Room Dried - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: TAPANULI SIBADAK SIDRA ANAEROBIC NATURAL DARK ROOM DRIED LIMIT OF 2 BAGS PER PERSON (Orders of more than 2 bags will be cancelled automatically) (NOTES) RED APPLE, HIBISCUS TEA, CURRANTS, LIQORICE PRODUCER: Alex Hutabarat - Sibadak Coffee REGION: Sitampurung, Tapanuli VARIETAL: Sidra PROCESS: Anaerobic Natural Dark Room Dried ELEVATION: 1250-1300 MASL HARVEST: September, 2025 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE PADI: IDR 950,000/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Located at 1,250–1,300 MASL in Sitampurung Village, North Tapanuli, Sibadak Coffee was established in 2017 by Alex Hutabarat. Alex applies organic-leaning farming methods, enriching soil with compost and minimizing pesticide use. Originally focused on P88 and Ateng Super, he introduced Sidra seeds in 2021, sourced from Ecuador. After seeing the variety’s remarkable potential, Alex expanded Sidra plantings and is now preparing to plant 30,000 new saeedlings at higher elevations. For this first-ever Anaerobic Natural DRD, ripe Sidra cherries are fermented for 72 hours in sealed tanks before entering a two-stage drying approach: five days of slow shade-drying, followed by 25 days in Alex’s newly built drying facility — a converted traditional house with controlled humidity and airflow. The result is a refined cup with vibrant clarity — marking a major step forward in Sibadak’s post-harvest innovation.

name: Ethiopia Alo Zero Hybrid Washed - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: ETHIOPIA ALO ZERO HYBRID WASHED (EXCLUSIVE LOT) 2021 COE ETHIOPIA #1 WINNER FARM (NOTES) APRICOT, WHITE PEACH, JASMINE, HONEY PRODUCER: Tamiru Tadesse - Alo Coffee REGION: Bensa, Sidama VARIETAL: 74158 PROCESS: Zero - Hybrid Washed ELEVATION: 2,100 - 2,580 MASL HARVEST: January, 2025 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE FOB: $ 50/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Founded in 2020 by Tamiru Tadesse in Bensa, Sidama, Alo Coffee has quickly emerged as one of Ethiopia’s most dynamic and forward-thinking producers. Built on Tamiru’s vision to combine craft and transparency, Alo focuses on elevating coffee quality through precise processing and long-term collaboration with local farmers. Each lot reflects a commitment to scientific innovation and a deep respect for the land that defines Sidama’s distinct coffee identity. Alo Coffee gained international recognition in 2021, earning first and fifth place at the Ethiopia Cup of Excellence — a rare double placement that signaled their arrival among Ethiopia’s most respected producers. This success reinforced Alo’s reputation for consistency and clarity, demonstrating how meticulous process control can reveal the full potential of Ethiopian terroir. This marks the first time Tamiru has experimented with the Hybrid Washed method, aiming to reduce fermentation influence so the terroir can shine more clearly in the cup. After selective picking, the cherries are pulped using an Ecowasher with a tight setting to strip off nearly all mucilage. The coffee then undergoes a 48-hour fermentation in sealed plastic tanks to refine the cup’s structure and balance. Once complete, it’s dried on African raised beds under the sun for around 12 days with careful turning to ensure even drying and preserve clarity.

name: Brazil Alto Caparao Pulped Natural - Espresso - 1kg, Probat UG15
description: BRAZIL ALTO CAPARAO PULPED NATURAL (NOTES) PEANUT BUTTER, BAKER’S CHOCOLATE, DRIED FRUITS, CITRUS PRODUCER: Alto Caparao Regional Producers REGION: Alto Caparao VARIETAL: Bourbon, Catuai, Mundo Novo PROCESS: Pulped Natural ELEVATION: 1100-1350 MASL PRICE CIF: IDR 141,428/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Perched on the border of Minas Gerais and Espírito Santo, the Alto Caparaó region lies within the Caparaó National Park, where rich volcanic soils and cool mountain conditions create the ideal environment for coffee cultivation. Generations of smallholder producers have shaped this landscape into one of Brazil’s top coffee origins. This regional blend brings together the work of producers across Alto Caparaó, offering a coffee that embodies the classic Brazilian profile. Processed using the Pulped Natural method, ripe cherries are depulped and dried with part of the mucilage still intact — a technique unique to Brazil. Drying typically takes place on open patios before being finished in mechanical dryers, a hallmark of Brazil’s advanced post-harvest practices. The result is a clean, well-rounded cup that reflects the country’s long tradition of precision, scale, and craftsmanship in coffee.

name: Ethiopia Nigusse Gemeda ASD Natural - Filter - 60g, Probat P01
description: ETHIOPIA NIGUSSE GEMEDA ANAEROBIC SLOW DRY NATURAL 2020 COE ETHIOPIA #1 WINNER FARM (NOTES) BLUEBERRY, VIOLET, TROPICAL FRUITS, BLACK TEA PRODUCER: Nigusse Gemeda - Karamo Coffee REGION: Bensa, Sidama VARIETAL: 74158 PROCESS: Anaerobic Slow Dry Natural ELEVATION: 2460 MASL HARVEST: January, 2025 RELATIONSHIP: 1 Year PRICE FOB: $ 52/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Nigusse Gemeda is a dedicated coffee farmer from the village of Hayisa in Keramo, Sidamo. His three-acre estate sits at an impressive 2,460 MASL — the highest elevation from which we have ever sourced coffee in Ethiopia. 2020 marked a defining moment for Nigusse, when his natural coffee earned 1st place at the Ethiopia Cup of Excellence with a score of 91.4, establishing him among Ethiopia’s finest producers. This exclusive ASD Natural lot is one of Nigusse’s most expressive coffee. After harvest, the coffee undergoes 120 hours of fermentation in tanks before being dried slowly on African raised beds. Inspired by Panama’s ASD approach, this gentle, extended drying accentuates complexity while preserving the integrity of the fruit. The result is a layered, vibrant with floral and fruit tones, and a refined sweetness that perfectly captures Sidamo highland terroir.

name: Tropi Frutty Blend - Espresso - 200g, Probat UG15
description: ESPRESSO TROPI FRUTTY (NOTES) BLACK - PEACH, TROPICAL FRUITS, ORANGE BLOSSOM WHITE - ORANGE COOKIE, VOILET, WHITE CHOCOLATE 50% ETHIOPIA WORKA NENKE WASHED 50% ETHIOPIA URABEAST NATURAL PRODUCER: Worka Nenke & Urabeast Washing Station REGION: Geed, SNNPR & Guji, Oromia VARIETAL: 74110, 74112 PROCESS: Washed & Natural ELEVATION: 1983 & 2020 MASL HARVEST: December 2024 - January 2025 PRICE FOB: $ 25.4/kg (RECIPE) BLACK: Dose 20 g, Yield 44 g, 26 s WHITE: Dose 20 g, Yield 38 g, 24-25 s in 4 oz cup

name: Puntang Sultani Bourbon CM Natural - Filter - 150g, Probat P01
description: JAVA MT. PUNTANG BOURBON CM NATURAL EXCLUSIVE LOT (NOTES) STRAWBERRY, CRANBERRY, RED GRAPE PRODUCER: Irwansyah Komaludin - Puntang Coffee REGION: Mt. Puntang, West Java VARIETAL: Bourbon PROCESS: CM Natural ELEVATION: 1350-1750 MASL RELATIONSHIP: 6 Years PRICE PADI: IDR 250,000/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM Puntang Coffee sits on the slopes of Mount Puntang, south of Bandung, where 155 smallholder farmers from three surrounding villages deliver their cherries. The area cultivates Typica, Bourbon, and S-795 — Typica prized for its delicate character despite low yield, while Bourbon and S-795 offer steady production and consistently strong cup potential. Under the leadership of Irwansyah, Puntang Coffee has grown into a community-driven group focused on quality improvement, fair returns for farmers, and environmentally conscious farming practices. For this CM Natural Bourbon lot, perfectly ripe cherries are sorted and placed into newly developed stainless-steel fermentation tanks for three days of sealed, oxygen-free carbonic maceration. After fermentation, the cherries are transferred to shaded raised beds for slow drying. The result is a clean, fruit-forward cup that showcases Bourbon’s natural sweetness and the increasing precision of Puntang’s post-harvest innovation.

name: Java Wanoja Yellow Caturra Hybrid Washed - Filter - 150g, Probat P01
description: JAVA WANOJA YELLOW CATURRA HYBRID WASHED (EXCLUSIVE LOT) (NOTES) YELLOW STONE FRUITS, GREEN GRAPE, ORANGE PRODUCER: Satrea Amambi - Wanoja Coffee REGION: Kamojang VARIETAL: Yellow Caturra PROCESS: Hybrid Washed ELEVATION: 1500-1600 MASL HARVEST: July, 2025 RELATIONSHIP: 8 Year PRICE PAID: IDR 268,000/kg A BRIEF HISTORY ABOUT THE FARM We’re proud to mark our eight year partnering with Wanoja Coffee, a cooperative on the slopes of Mount Kamojang, West Java. Founded in 2012 by Eti Sumiati, Wanoja — meaning woman in Sundanese — reflects its beginnings as a women-led farming group. Today, under the leadership of her sonA, Satrea Amambi, the cooperative has reached new heights, earning 2nd place at the 2021 Cup of Excellence Indonesia. This exclusive lot marks Wanoja Coffee’s first-ever attempt at a Hybrid Washed process, using the Yellow Caturra variety celebrated for its sweetness. The two-stage fermentation starts with a 36-hour aerobic step, followed by depulping and a 48-hour anaerobic fermentation in tank. The result is a vibrant, structured cup that amplifies the variety’s natural sweetness.

name: Java Wanoja Anaerobic Natural - Espresso - 200g, Probat UG15
description: JAVA WANOJA ANAEROBIC NATURAL (NOTES) WILD DARK BERRIES, TANGERINE, FRUITY CHOCOLATE PRODUCER: Wanoja Cooperative REGION: Kamojang, West Java VARIETAL: Kartika, S-795, Sigararutang PROCESS: Anaerobic Natural ALTITUDE: 1500 MASL RELATIONSHIP: 9 Years PRICE PAID: IDR 188,000/kg Wanoja Co-op is among our favourite producers in West Java. The farm is located in Kamojang, on the slopes of Mt. Guntur in West Java. Owned by Ibu Etty, the farm was bought back in 2012 as her retirement venture. Now together with her son, they’re working on over 11 hectaers of land planted with coffee. They invest considerable time and resources both in new equipment and planting of new varieties in order to improve the quality and productivity. Their commitment to developing quality coffee in Kamojang is what fascinates us in the first place.

name: Two Hands Full House Blend - Espresso - 200g, Probat UG15
description: ESPRESSO TWO HANDS FULL HOUSE BLEND (NOTES) BLACK - DRIED FRUITS, TANGERINE, CHOCOLATE MILK - MILK CHOCOLATE, TOASTED ALMOND, SOFT TANGERINE 40% Brazil Alto Caprao Pulped Natural 40% Kerinci Kayu Aro Washed 20% Kerinci Rukun Saudara Natural Our blend is the outcome of purposeful partnership to grow together with our producers. We maintain the partnership with our producers by buying not only their specially prepared micro or nano lots but also their larger volume lots.

name: The Olmecs Blend Nyawang Langit - Halus 250 gram
description: ETHIOPIA + SUMATRA + JAVA THE OLMECS BLEND A ESPRESSO BLEND FROM NYAWANG LANGIT: THE OLMECS IS OUR SPECIAL. ESPRESSO BLEND BORN FROM COMBINING THREE OF THE WORLD'S BEST COFFEE REGIONS. NYAWANG LANGIT TASTING NOTES & OUTPUT CHOCOLATE, BERRIES, HINT OF VANILLA, CARAMEL, SWEET AFTER TASTE ESPRESSO RESSO AN INTENSE AND BALANCED SHOT, OPENING WITH A DOMINANT NOTE OF RICH CHOCOLATE, ENRICHED BY SUBTLE FLORAL HINTS AND CHEERFUL BERRIES. FINISHING SWEETLY WITH A TOUCH OF VANILLA AND CARAMEL BLACK CRAFTED FOR A POWERFUL AND PROFOUND FLAVOR RICH CHOCOLATE DOMINATES, PERFECTED BY THE COMPLEX SWEETNESS OF MELTING BROWN SUGAR AND CARAMEL. FLORAL AND BERRIES PROVIDE BRIGHT LAYERS, RESULTING IN A STRONG AND DISTINCTIVE FINISH. WHITE TRANSFORMS INTO A LUXURIOUS GOURMAND EXPERIENCE, RESEMBLING A SMOOTH CHOCOLATE CARAMEL TRIFLE. IT FEATURES CREAMY MILK CHOCOLATE AND CARAMEL, AMPLIFIED BY VANILLA AND ELEGANT FLORAL NOTES. WITH A SLIGHT HINT OF BERRIES.

name: AN Matcha Powder Ceremonial Grade 30g
description: AN Matcha is a Ceremonial Grade Matcha from Kagoshima, Japan,with Saemidori cultivar, While it was only officially registered in 1971, this cultivar quickly gained a reputation for its exceptional qualities. Saemidori is a hybrid of Yabukita (Japan's most common tea cultivar) and Asatsuyu, inheriting the best traits from both. What makes Saemidori special is its visual and flavor profile. The tea leaves produce a matcha powder with a vibrant, jewel-toned green color, which indicates high quality and rich chlorophyll content. It also has a complex and delicious flavor. a rich umami taste balanced by a prominent natural sweetness. The powder's silky- smooth texture allows it to whisk into a thick, stable foam, a key sign of high-quality matcha. In short, Saemidori is a top-tier cultivar that perfectly blends stunning visual appeal with a superior taste, making it a modern star in the world of matcha

name: Seimei Matcha Powder Organic Ceremonial 30g
description: SEIMEI Matcha Organic Ceremonial Grade is a premium Japanese green tea from Kagoshima, grown with strict organic farming methods that honor nature and tradition. The tea leaves are shaded before harvest to enhance their chlorophyll and sweetness, then carefully handpicked and stone-ground into a vibrant green powder. Known for its smooth umami flavor, natural sweetness, and rich aroma, Seimei Matcha is not only a symbol of Japanese tea culture but also a source of wellness, packed with antioxidants, vitamins, and calming L-theanine that provide both sustained energy and mental clarity, making every cup a moment of harmony and mindfulness, 30g

name: Loishi Matcha Powder Organic Ceremonial 30g
description: LOISHI Matcha is a Organic Ceremonial Grade Japanese green tea powder crafted with tradition and care, grown in shaded tea gardens to enhance its vibrant green color and rich umami flavor. Harvested with precision and passed through generations of expertise, the leaves are steamed, dried, and stone-ground into a fine, silky powder that preserves their delicate aroma and smooth taste. Known for its balance of gentle sweetness and earthy depth, Loishi Matcha embodies not only a refined flavor but also a philosophy of mindfulness, inviting people to savor each moment while honoring the harmony between nature and craftsmanship,30g

name: Pacira Estate 20/50 | Filter Roast Arabica Coffee - 100 gram
description: Introducing Pacira’s Estate 20/50, a stunning Natural process microlot from the peaks of Rancabali, West Java. Sitting at 1600 MASL, this coffee represents the best of the Pacira Team’s craftsmanship.The combination of Java and Bourbon varieties creates a unique flavor profile that balances the classic sweetness of West Java with a vibrant, modern fruitiness. Expect a bouquet of red berries followed by a smooth, chocolatey mouthfeel that makes every sip feel like a treat. Tasting Notes: Yellow Plum | Nectarine | Citrus Blossoms Origin: Indra Giri, West Java Producer: Pacira Team Experience the peak of West Java specialty coffee. name: FINCA DE BERMAN SPESIAL RILIS BBRC 7 | Filter Roast Arabica Coffee - Finca De Berman Natural Hypoxia
description: When Science meets the bean at Finca de Berman. ️ We’ve just landed two experimental microlots that push the boundaries of fermentation. Whether you’re a fan of the deep, winey notes of the Natural Hypoxia (fermented in low-oxygen environments) or the vibrant, zesty punch of the Wet Hulled Mossto (fermented with juices from the natural hypoxia), these coffees are built for the adventurous palate. Natural Hypoxia: Citrus Blossoms | Nectarine | Red grape Mt. Papandayan 1750 masl | kartika, lini s Wet Hulled Mossto: Watermelon | Guava | Caramel Lamping Adi, Mt. Tilu 1650 masl | kartika, lini s Which process are you trying first? name: Argopuro Estate Filter Roasted - Natural Anaerobic, Beans/Biji
description: FILTER ROASTED PACKED IN 150grams in BOX Argopuro Estate Beans ini terkenal dengan proses pasca panen yang keren dan unik. Proses pasca panen yang unik diimbangi dengan fermentasi yang tepat merupakan kombinasi terbaik. Flavor argopuro juga memberikan spektrum yang khas terutama pada cita rasa buah-buahan tropis dengan sweetness gula tebu nya. Natural Anaerobic Process Proses natural dengan fermentasi secara anaerob pada beans ini mampu menghasilkan citarasa "candied" dan acidity lembut/mellow. Hermetic Sealed Natural Proses fermentasi natural yang menggunakan hermetic bag pada fermentasinya, mampu menciptakan flavor tropical fruits yang matang dan sweetness jelas seperti milkchoco.

name: Kerinci Gunung Tujuh Filter Roasted - Lactic Natural, Beans/Biji
description: FILTER ROASTED PACKED IN 150grams in BOX KERINCI GUNUNG TUJUH Kerinci Gunung Tujuh merupakan prosesor hebat berasal dari kerinci dengan segala hal cara prosesnya hingga treatment pada kebunnya. Semua hal detail telah mereka pikirkan hingga membuat tanaman kopi tumbuh subur dan menghasilkan flavor luar biasa saat ini. Khusus pada crop 2025 ini, kami mengambil beberapa proses yang kami rasa memiliki cita rasa unik. Lactic Natural proses pasca panen yang melibatkan fermentasi secara laktik yang akan menghasilkan sweetness lebih tinggi dari proses lainnya serta memberikan kesan berbeda pada acidity quality. pada proses ini sweetness lebih seperti gula dengan iringan sweetness buah matang. Sedangkan acidity qualitynya berkesan seperti buah berry. Caramella Proses fermentasi caramella dilakukan untuk menambah citarasa sweetness nya, dan benar pada kopi ini sweetness brownsugar dan caramel sangat jelas pada setiap layer suhunya mulai dari panas hingga dingin. Cita rasa buah matang yang manis juga terdapat pada layer kopi ini menjadikan keseluruhan flavor lebih seru saat dinikmati.

name: Windusari Magelang Filter Roasted - Mixed Variety, Beans/Biji
description: FILTER ROASTED PACKED IN 150gram in BOX WINDUSARI Windusari merupakan salah satu origin mitra kami yang pada tahun 2025 ini membuat beberapa proses pasca panen yang kami ambil 2 terbaiknya. Proses pasca panen kali ini berkisar pada natural dengan memberikan treatment khusus pada fermentasinya sehingga memberikan sweetness dan acidity yang lebih seru pada crop tahun-tahun sebelumnya. Origin windusari memang tidak seterkenal origin lainnya, namun bagi kami origin ini memiliki ciri khas tersendiri dari quality acidity dan sweetness nya. Perbedaan Mixed Variety dan Single Var Lini-S Pada Lini-S, memiliki perbedaan yang sangat mencolok pada struktur sweetness nya yang menyerupai gula pasir dengan acidity buah matang namun tidak overfermented Pada Mixed Variety, memiliki sweetness menyerupai brownsugar dengan acidity buah segar

name: Swargi Lot Filter Roasted Beans Special - Wih Ilang, Beans/Biji
description: SWARGI LOT PACK DALAM 150gram in BOX FILTER ROASTED SWARGI-LOT Lot kebun atau lot proses khusus yang kami hadirkan untuk memberikan cita rasa khas dari proses fermentasi yang telah kami jalankan di kebun-kebun pilihan kami sendiri. Lot ini kami proses secara khusus terlebih pada fase fermentasi karena fermentasi dapat merubah spektrum rasa kopi menjadi luar biasa. Beberapa kebun kami coba menerapkan cara proses fermentasi yang berbeda agar menghasilkan flavor terbaik pada masing-masing originnya sehingga memiliki ciri khas tersendiri. Kami juga menggunakan lot ini untuk kebutuhan kompetisi sejak tahun 2023 lalu. Beberapa tim kami juga telah berhasil menjuarai kompetisi dengan menggunakan beans ini.

name: Ijen Estate Banyuwangi Filter Roasted Beans - Mossto Natural
description: IJEN ESTATE - BANYUWANGI, EAST JAVA Pack 150gram in Box (NETTO 150gram) Crop terbaru di tahun 2025 ini merupakan pembaharuan dari crop sebelumnya dengan beberapa penyempurnaan secara processings produksi. Beberapa cara yang dikembangkan oleh Alm. Dandy Dharmawan kini telah disempurnakan dan dilanjutkan oleh timnya. Karakter Singkat Mossto Natural Acidity khas buah matang dengan layering sweetness berupa coklat dan brownsugar membuat kesan fermentasi lebih smooth Carbonic Maceration Natural Fermentasi yang menghasilkan nuansa tropical fruits matang dengan layering choco-liquor namun tidak over fermented Caramella Process Fermentasi yang menonjolkan sweetness seperti brownsugar hingga sweetness buah ada disini.

name: Swargi Palate Cleanser For Coffee Cupping
description: Swargi Palate Cleanser packed each 10mL in Box produk ini diciptakan sebagai palate cleanser atau pembersih palate lidah anda saat menguji cita rasa/ cupping kopi. Ketika cupping kopi, sangat berpengaruh akibat residu kopi sebelunya dan produk ini berfungsi untuk mereset palate lidah anda untuk memberikan efek clean dan lebih sensitif ketika menguji cita rasa maupun saat perlombaan triangulasi/ Ujian Q grader / Cupping sample / Cup Taster. Produk ini sangat simple hanya dengan memberikan 2 drops saja untuk 100mL air mineral dan digunakan untuk berkumur (dapat diminum) setelah, sebelum maupun diantara cupping sample kopi.

name: Swargi Brewing Water for coffee - AURA
description: Swargi Brewing water 50mL per pack AURA memberikan karakter balance untuk hasil seduhan yang memiliki acidity yang elegan, namun tetap memiliki karakter tekstur yang smooth. Cocok digunakan untuk kopi yang memiliki karakter fruity dan akan ditonjolkan sweet dan ripe fruitsnya tanpa merusak struktur body yang ada. VELVET memberikan karakter yang super delicate dan smooth textured serta mampu membuat kopimu lebih round. konsekuensinya adalah menurunkan sedikit acidity untuk mengejar textur yang round itu. karakter silky dan creamy ada di sini. Kopi dengan fermentasi yang tinggi biasanya berkarakter funky dan memiliki defect Dry, kesan dry tersebut dapat dihilangkan dan menjadi lebih manis. Velvet juga bisa menghilangkan bitterness, dry pada kopi yang berfermentasi tinggi. CLARITY diciptakan untuk kopi yang ingin ditonjolkan acidity nya menjadi lebih vibrant dan berkualitas. Menonjolkan acidity namun tetap memiliki karakter body yang smooth tentunya. Clarity sangat cocok untuk kopi yang memiliki sweetness tinggi dan akan dimanipulasi acidity nya agar lebih tampak dan vibrant pada cup.

name: Mid Grade Espresso Candy Crema 100% Arabica - 200gr
description: ✨ Espresso Candy Crema Komersial espresso Mid grade yang dikenal sebagai "Espresso Candy Crema". Produk ini menawarkan pengalaman rasa yang unik. 🍓 Rasa Fruity yang Sangat Nikmat: Dengan rasa fruity yang sangat nikmat, espresso ini siap memanjakan lidah Anda. Cocok untuk penggunaan komersial. 📝 Detail Lengkap: Espresso beans ini didesain untuk supply coffeeshop dengan kebutuhan grade komersial yang memiliki flavor fruity ripe fruits yang jelas. Roast level: Medium Netto: 1000 gram Pack: non valve (untuk grade komersial) Rest time: 2 minggu pasca roasted date

name: Mid Grade Espresso Magic Crema 50% Arabica : 50% Robusta - 200gr
description: MAGIC CREMA Ingridients: 50% Arabica Natural : 50% Robusta Natural Espresso beans Mid grade dengan flavor unik yang bergaris besar pada fruity flavor. Detail flavor bisa dilihat pada gambar. Roast level: Medium Rest time: 2 minggu pasca roasting date Grade: Commercial

name: Houseblend Espresso Peanut Butter - 200gr
description: the attributes of sweet taste, chocolate, silky sensation, roasted peanut all come together so we imagine it is like peanut butter. Peanut butter is everyone's favorite and never fails when used as a mixture in any food or type of bread. The impression of soft jam, delicious nuts and sweet chocolate accents are the main attributes of this coffee. Sweet chocolate with a texture similar to choco powder makes this blend similar to food that has several textures in it. Not only that, this coffee also has roasted peanuts as a complement to each layer. in black, flavor notes such as chocolate powder, brown sugar, peanuts in white, flavor notes such as toasted bread, roasted peanuts, smooth chocolate, herbs Blend of : Cerrado, Brazil & Robusta Central Java Altitude : 1300 MASL & 900 MASL Process : Natural & Natural Varietal : Mixed Main flavorwise : Roasted Peanuts, Toasted Bread, Choco powder, Herbs, Peanut butter

name: Houseblend Espresso Malted Cookies - 1kg
description: We imagined it was like enjoying cereal and cookies at the same time when we first tasted this coffee. The dominant grainy attribute accompanied by a chocolate taste like chocolate cookies and a touch of dried raisins is very suitable to be enjoyed. This blend is very suitable for those of you who have tastes like cereal, delicious sweetness in cookies, a very clear touch of chocolate in the taste, and a layer of dried raisin which adds a fruity accent to this blend. in black, has flavor notes of apple, malt, chocolate, peanuts in white, has flavor notes of raisins, grainy, sweet chocolate, roasted peanuts Blend of : Gayo, Aceh & Cerrado, Brazil Altitude : 1400 MASL & 1300 MASL Process : Wet-hulled & Natural Varietal : Mixed Main flavorwise : Dried raisins, Grainy, Cereal, Sweet Chocolate, Cookies

name: Houseblend Espresso Fruit Fantasy - 200gr
description: Specialty Grade 100% Arabica Fruit Fantasy is a very dominant blend with ripe fruit notes accompanied by high sweetness. The fruit is so complex and layered that it's like fantasizing about an orchard. Fruity flavor notes and a smooth texture make this coffee taste like yogurt. This coffee also has a second layer when the temperature is warm, namely herbal flavors such as cinnamon and star anise which also enrich the flavor of your cup. Fruit fantasy not only has high fruity and sweetness taste attributes, moreover it has high complexity from the spectrum of fruit, herbs, nuts and fermented accents. We present different espresso flavors with our roasting profile specifically for this blend. Our roasting profile functions to increase sweetness without eliminating the acidity of the coffee Blend of : Argopuro, East Java & Wonosalam, East Java Altitude : 1200 MASL & 1100 MASL Process : Anaerobic Natural & Classic Natural Varietal : Mixed Main flavorwise : Yogurt, Jackfruit, Strawberries waffle, Cinnamon, Vanilla

name: Houseblend Espresso Something Sweet - 200gr
description: Specialty grade 100% Arabica Something sweet was created because of our first impression of enjoying this coffee, we were surprised by its extraordinary sweet taste. The sweet taste that arises is not like the sweet impression of normal natural coffee, but like the smooth taste of fermented fruit coated with the impression of floral tea. A very balanced coffee blend due to its extraordinary sweetness complemented by comfortable acidity. So in black, you will get notes like jackfruit, caramel, sugary. However, when in white the impression becomes almond, bread and remains sweet. This blend aims to give the impression of a dominant classic flavor, but with high sweetness and fruity notes that are still very clear in every sip. Blend of : Cerrado, Minas Gerias, Brazil & Wonosalam, East Java Altitude : 1300 MASL & 1100 MASL Process : Natural & Classic Natural Varietal :Mixed Main flavorwise Caramel, Almond, Sugary, Jackfruit, toasted bread

name: Houseblend Espresso Hazelnut Praline - 200gr
description: Specialty Grade 100% Arabica The first impression when we tried this coffee with our special roasting profile was that it was like chocolate candy with a fruity impression and a strong hazelnut flavor in each layer. This impression reminds us of Praline. Praline is a chocolate candy made from a mixture of chocolate and butter and then added with fruit or nuts. The flavor of this coffee is very close to types of nuts such as hazelnuts, peanuts, almonds and is accompanied by the taste of plums and peaches. in black, the impression of high acidity is balanced by notes of hazelnut and chocolate butter. in white, classic flavors such as cookies, sourdough, hazelnut with a touch of orange as acidity. Origin : Minas Gerias, Brazil Processor : Cerrado Mineiro Altitude : 1300 MASL Process : Natural Varietal : Catuai, Catucai, Mundo Novo, Bourbon Main flavorwise : Hazelnut, Butter Choco, Sourdough, Smooth Orange, Cookies

name: Houseblend Espresso Ketelan - 200gr
description: Specialty grade 100% Arabica The name Jageran is the name of the street in front of the alley where we currently live. Without losing the philosophical elements, we use this as the name of our blend. This blend is a mixture of different coffee origins but in one aspect of the same natural process. This mixing aims to give the perception of a different mature bauh taste accompanied by a fermentation accent in each sip. Very far from being over-fermented, this coffee provides a new sensation in enjoying the spectrum of fermented coffee which really emphasizes the character of ripe fruit, a sweet taste like sugar cane and an aftertaste like jasmine tea. This blend is very suitable for connoisseurs who like the fruity character of coffee in espresso and milk beverages. The character of espresso and milk beverages is not too different, namely remaining on the fruit spectrum with a slight cookie accent in milk beverages that may be found. Blend of : Rancabali and Mt. Guntur Process : Anaerobic Natural and Natural Main Flavorwise : Mixed ripe berries, Pomelo, Choco liquor, Cookies

name: Houseblend Espresso Jageran Blend - 200gr
description: Specialty grade 100% Arabica The name Jageran is the name of the street in front of the alley where we currently live. Without losing the philosophical elements, we use this as the name of our blend. This blend has a strong fermented and ripe fruit flavor character and is accompanied by a touch of malt character and nut grains such as almonds. Ripe fruit notes are the top notes then slowly end with malt and grain characters. We try to provide a new flavor perspective by combining the fermentation process with the wet-hulled process. so we can present layered flavor characters from start to finish comfortably.. The roast profile that we use for this blend is to increase the sweetness without losing the fruity character and still have a smooth body Blend of : Mt. Guntur and Gayo Process : Anaerobic Natural and wet-hulled Main Flavorwise : Dark plum, Peach, Syrupy, Almond

name: Mid Grade Espresso Malt Crema 100% Arabica - 200 gr
description: MALT CREMA Beans yang diroasting khusus untuk kebutuhan espresso dengan grade Mid Grade. Beans ini diciptakan untuk kebutuhan espresso dengan flavor yang asik namun tetap dalam konsep ekonomis. Ingridients: 100% Arabica Natural Process (East Java) Possible tasting notes: Tropical fruits - Ripe Grapes - Fermented - Chocolate - Hazelnut - Medium body (grind silahkan klik/chat dm, jika tidak ada notes akan kami kirim whole beans)

name: Mid Grade Espresso Malt Nuts 75% Arabica : 25% Robusta - 200 gr
description: MALT & NUTS Beans yang diroasting khusus untuk kebutuhan espresso dengan grade Mid Grade. Beans ini diciptakan untuk kebutuhan espresso dengan flavor yang asik namun tetap dalam konsep ekonomis. Ingridients: 75% Arabica Natural Process x 25% Robusta Natural Process (East Java x West Java) Possible tasting notes: Ripe Tropical Fruits - Almond - Chocolate - Medium Body (grind silahkan klik/chat dm, jika tidak ada notes akan kami kirim whole beans)

name: Mid Grade Espresso Gold Crema 50% Arabica : 50% Robusta - 1000 gr
description: GOLD CREMA Beans yang diroasting khusus untuk kebutuhan espresso dengan grade Mid Grade Beans ini diciptakan untuk kebutuhan espresso dengan flavor yang asik namun tetap dalam konsep ekonomis. Ingridients: 50% Arabica Natural Process x 50% Robusta Natural Process (East Java x West Java) Possible tasting notes: Sweet Chocolate - Ripe Fruits - Nuts - Caramel - Medium Body (grind silahkan klik/chat dm, jika tidak ada notes akan kami kirim whole beans)

name: Kopi Arabika Espresso Aceh Orange Tea Kopi Espesso Gunung Puntang Mix Aceh 200gr - 100gr, Biji
description: Kopi Portacaba berasal dari berbagai daerah Indonesia, kaya akan rasa. Kopi Halu Choco Banana dengan profile roasting Medium cocok untuk pecinta kopi modern. name: NinetyPlus Panama Geisha Volcan Baru 90+ | Exotic Series Coffee | Specialty Collins Roasters - 12gr (Single)
description: Panama Geisha Thermolic (90+) | Exotic Coffee FILTER ROAST Tasting notes : Red Cherry | Dried Rose | Plum Origin : Volcan Baru, Panama Farm : Volcan Baru Valley (90+) Variety : Geisha Altitude : 1.480 masl Process : Thermolic Packaging Size : 13gr (Single Pack), 75gr(jar) Ninety Plus Coffee is a grower and producer of single-origin, single-variety coffee in both Panama and Ethiopia. They are dedicated to creating a remarkable taste experience through process innovation. At their core is a connection to nature, best social practices and working to fix a broken system through creating canopy and restoration ecology. They are stewards for taste committed to leaving coffee better than we found it. As a global coffee grower and producer, Ninety Plus is at the forefront of engineering elevated taste experiences for consumers through their innovative processing methods. They are committed to fixing a broken farm model, leaving coffee better than we found it, with guiding principles of taste, humanity, and ecology. Panama Ninety Plus Volcan Valley Coffee Geisha Thermolic

name: Sendok Takar Kopi 2in1 Stainless Alat Seduh Coffee Maker Penjepit Clip - Rose Gold
description: Halo, Sobat Brewer! Butuh sendok takar yang fungsinya enggak cuman untuk menakar saja? Ingin yang bisa digunakan untuk kegunaan lain alias sendok multifungsi? Ini dia yang kalian cari! Sendok ini dapat digunakan sebagai takaran saat membuat kopi maupun teh. Diperlukan suatu satuan ukur yang tepat untuk mendapatkan hasil yang sempurna. Tidak hanya berguna sebagai sendok, tetapi juga terdapat clip pada bagian gagang sendok ini yang dapat dimanfaatkan untuk merapatkan kembali kemasan teh dan kopi yang sudah dibuka. Berapa sendok kopi untuk 1 cangkir? Sediakan 2 sendok teh kopi bubuk dalam cangkir, lalu tambahkan 125 ml air panas aduk hingga menyatu. Bagaimana cara menghitung rasio kopi? -> Rasio seduh bisa berkisar mulai 1 gram kopi berbanding 1 ml air (1:1) sampai 1 gram kopi berbanding 30 ml air (1:30). Dalam dunia specialty coffee umumnya rasio yang digunakan adalah 1 gram kopi berbanding 13-18 ml air. SPESIFIKASI PRODUK : Material = Stainless Steel Dimensi = - Panjang: 175 mm - Diameter Kepala Sendok: 37 mm PERHATIAN! Mohon videokan proses pembukaan paket. Kami tidak menerima komplain apabila terdapat kekurangan maupun kerusakan pada barang tanpa adanya video unboxing. Disarankan untuk menambah Xtra Bubble Wrap untuk meminimalisir hal yang tidak di inginkan. name: BIJI KOPI ARABICA HONEY BERRY SWEETY Specialty Arabika Sakha Coffee Roastery - 100gr, Biji Kopi
description: Halo, Sobat Brewer! APA ITU HONEY BERRY SWEETY? Kopi ini adalah racikan filter blend dari dua origin di Sumatera, yaitu: Gayo Honey & Kerinci Natural Anaerob. Sudah terbayang rasanya? Didasari dari potensi kopi gayo honey yang menurut tim kami sangat menarik jika bisa develop lebih, kami terfikir untuk menambah sedikit rasa yang lebih “Punchy” dari kerinci anaerob natural. Karakter manis seperti madu dipadukan dengan sedikit fruity dari blueberry membuat kopi ini lebih menyenangkan. Kopi ini hadir untuk para penikmat kopi harian dengan intensitas medium dan rasa yang menyegarkan. NO. name: Moka Pot Coffee Maker Alat Kopi Bubuk Espresso Black Coffe Teko Coffe Moca Pot Aluminium - Moka Pot Silver 300ml
description: Halo, Sobat Brewer! Moka pot merupakan inovasi baru untuk membuat kopi dengan cara yang sangat mudah dan cepat. Kini, kalian enggak perlu repot lagi untuk menyeduh kopi dengan menggunakan moka pot. Saat membuat kopi menggunakan teko moka pot, cairan kopi ini akan langsung tertampung pada sebuah teko. Dengan begitu, kalian dapat tinggal menuang kopi ke cangkir dengan cara yang mudah. Tidak perlu repot-repot lagi untuk menyeduh kopi. Bagaimana cara menggunakan moka pot? Moka pot merupakan salah satu alat penyeduh kopi tertua yang banyak digunakan di Italia. Cara penggunaannya sangat gampang, kita tinggal mendidihkannya di atas kompor dengan menggunakan 'Tatakan Kompor Mokapot' yang kami jual juga untuk melengkapi alat seduh Mokapot tersebut. name: Kopi Gold Breakfast Blend Espresso Coffee Bean 1Kg Biji Bubuk Coffe - Biji Kopi
description: Halo, Sobat Brewer! Pagimu belum sempurna jika belum diawali dengan kopi, bukan? Kini, BREAKFAST BLEND hadir untuk menemani sarapan pagimu sebelum melakukan aktivitas! Selain bisa dinikmati di rumah, Kopi Breakfast Blend ini juga sangat cocok untuk kebutuhan komersial. Contohnya, seperti di kedai-kedai kopi atau bisa juga untuk hotel-hotel yang umumnya menyajikan menu kopi bersamaan dengan sarapan pagi. Apa perbedaan single origin dan house blend? Persepsi utama yang harus dijadikan patokan adalah single origin merupakan jenis kopi yang berasal dari satu daerah. Sedangkan coffe house blend merupakan percampuran kopi dari beberapa daerah. Bukan hanya percampuran beberapa daerah saja, namun juga bisa percampuran dari beberapa jenis kopi. Untuk kalian yang belum mempunyai alat giling kopi/grinder, tidak perlu khawatir karena Breakfast Blend ini sudah tersedia dalam bentuk Biji Kopi, maupun Bubuk Kopi. kalian bisa tentukan pilihan tersebut di menu varian giling. Pastikan untuk memilih varian produk yang diinginkan. Jika tidak memilih, maka produk akan dikirim secara acak. NO.
